name: ITP - Tupiko Stream Bridge - Scour Protection - H1501A - Reinforced Slope (Rock Bolts, Soil Nails)

name: Detail - Before setout of the reinforced slope method all vegetation clearance & any bulk earthworks is to be completed

Detail - Bench to be 2m of less - the top of the row not to be above 1.5m above the bench
